title: Guardian naga
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| guardian naga N [![Guardian naga.png](/images/1/1f/Guardian_naga.png)](/File:Guardian_naga.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |

|   |                                                                                                    |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A hybrid; human from the chest up, with a scaly, muscular torso trailing off like that of a snake. |

## Useful Info

[Guardian nagas]() are powerful naga warriors found in the lower levels of the [Snake Pit](/Snake_Pit "Snake Pit") which leave [mutagenic corpses](/Mutagenic_corpse "Mutagenic corpse").

Spells: [Teleport Other](/Teleport_Other "Teleport Other"), [Slow](/Slow "Slow"), [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt"), and [Minor Healing](/Minor_Healing "Minor Healing").

## Tips & Tricks

Be careful, they're faster than most nagas. [Control Teleport](/Control_Teleport "Control Teleport") will make fighting these guys less annoying.

## History

Guardian nagas were removed in [0.6](/0.6 "0.6") in favor of [guardian serpents](/Guardian_serpent "Guardian serpent").
html:
Guardian naga

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
guardian naga N 
HP 24 to 64
HD 8
XP 457
Speed 15
AC 6
EV 14
Will -6
Attack1 26 (hit: plain)


Resistances rPois+
Vulnerabilities none
Habitat land
Intelligence High
Uses Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Big
Type naga, guardian naga
Flags Spellcaster
See invisible
Actual spells
Warm-blooded
Speaks
A hybrid; human from the chest up, with a scaly, muscular torso trailing off like that of a snake.

Useful Info

Guardian nagas are powerful naga warriors found in the lower levels of the Snake Pit which leave mutagenic corpses.

Spells: Teleport Other, Slow, Venom Bolt, and Minor Healing.

Tips & Tricks

Be careful, they're faster than most nagas. Control Teleport will make fighting these guys less annoying.

History

Guardian nagas were removed in 0.6 in favor of guardian serpents.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Guardian_naga&oldid=2357"
